title: Customers & Leads
description: Customers and Leads are the core entity in this CRM. Everything is linked underneath one of these: Contacts, Quotes, Jobs, Websites, Invoices, Tickets, Files and more

topics.title: What is the standard workflow (eg: Creating Jobs, Invoices, Projects, Customers)
How to change customers on an invoice
Move a Contact to another Customer
Using customer extra fields in invoices
Password reset for a customer doesn't work
Customer / User cannot change password / profile link doesn't work

config.customer_signup_email_welcome_template: Which template to email to customer after successful customer signup.
config.customer_signup_email_admin_template: Which template to email to admin after successful customer signup.
config.customer_mask_0: This is the mask to apply to custom numbers. Uses sprintf() format
config.customer_next_0: The next customer number that will be used
